title: Minnie
brief_description: A collection of cartoons featuring Minnie Mouse a close friend of Mickey’s. Minnie can be seen in many funny and exciting situations staring along side Mickey and many other favourites including Pluto, Goofy, Figaro and Mortimer Mouse. This collection includes an introduction with rare footage of Walt Disney and the creation of the Mickey Mouse character, from the small garage that he was created in to the huge Disney studio.
